comment: MR. C is the best teacher ever!!! I miss his stories and his dry sense of humor!!! Wish I was still in his class

So sad to see this man retire, but very honored to be a part of the last class he taught. He is the sweetest, funniest, and most brilliant man. Love him and will be forever grateful for this semester. Love you, Prof. Cronin! See you at 100 years old. ;)

I. Love. George. Cronin. Unfortunately, this was his last semester of teaching. It is so sad to see him leave after so many years of teaching. He was so funny, so sweet, so brilliant, and just amazing...
Everything you need to know he will tell you in class. All you have to do to get an A is go to class everyday. His class is very interesting and he is actually fun to listen to. Take his class!

Prof. Cronin is an amazing guy. This class is one you literally have to try to fail. All you've got to do is go to class. It's that simple! He tells you exactly what's going to be on the tests, and exactly how to do the mid-term and finals. You've got to get this guy for this class! He can ramble sometimes, but the stories he tells are funny!

he is amazing! and loves to teach! i was in the class that got the lowest average on the test and the midterm and he was more upset and shocked than anything else. He tells you what's on the test (anything that he repeats that is important) tells you EXACTLY how to do the midterm took , take home final will pass w good notes! Must attend! no book!

Cronin is definitely the guy to take. He's awesome. Make sure you pay attention to his "very important things" as they are the only things on his tests. 2 take home map quizzes are easy 100s. Midterm is bullet points. TAKE THIS CLASS.

Prof Cronin is so kind and funny; his lectures are amazing, but sometimes confusing. As someone with very little background in world history, I got lost easily. Still, I would take him again. I suggest getting the textbook and reading it before each lecture. His tests don't really follow the book, but at least you'll be able to follow the lecture!
Don't bother buying the book. Professor Cronin gives all of the answers to every exam in class. Show up, takes notes when he tells you to and you WILL get an A!

Easy A. trust me. He gives you the answers to all the tests, literally. All you really have to do on your own is the final which is take home, but still isnt too hard. Funny professor. Tells lots of stories and is actually fun to listen to, and I hate history. Def. recommend.
Easiest class you'll ever take. If you go to class, you will get an A.
Great stories, fun teacher.  Would recommend

Cronin is seriously be best professor I have ever had! He tells what the test questions and answers are, only 3 tests. The final and midterm are "essays" in list form. He is super sweet and engaging. If you attend class and share notes, you'll make an A.
Cronin is the best KSU has! He tells you what is on the tests and final. His story telling is amazing and completely relates back to the content. I wish he taught other history classes

Take him, easy proff. All you do is take notes to his lectures. Also he tells you whats on the test and the answers to the test. Great story teller. Great Teacher. He is well educated, and has traveled a lot. He has great examples. Just listen to him, and you'll get an A. You learn something everyday with this teacher.

Best teacher ksu has to offer. Don't think, just sign up for his class, I despise history and this man has me questioning whether or not I want to switch to a history major.You will actually want to go to his class and be bummed out if you miss the class. He gives the answers to legit everything, I mean everything. Oh and his classes are mega short

I think Mr.Cronin is a wonderful teacher.  I came into this class thinking I was going to hate it, but end up really enjoying it because he is a great story teller and well traveled and is very helpful on test.  You're missing out if you don't take him.

Professor Cronin is really funny and entertaining, however you must take notes in his class in order to do well on quizes. The mid-term and final are seriously easy and he is very helpful and wants to make college fun. I would take him again.

Professor Cronin is a really interesting man. He has lived a very exciting life and is absolutely brilliant. No one knows more about history than this guy. However, what he lectures on is not what the tests are on, therefore you MUST read the book to do well on the tests. Yes, he gives some answers, but the grade is not given to you.

EXCELLENT professor. Wish I could have had him for hist2112. Keeps history interesting and makes you want to come to class. His tests are easy and if you come to class you will get A's on them every time. Always has a story to tell for every lecture. If you want a good history class and an easy A, take him.
Excellent Professor with an engaging story-telling format to his lectures. History is, after all, about stories. You always have a beginning, a middle and an end.

I thought this would be an easy A according to all the entries below me. It's not. I went to every class and he would only give you like half of the questions and expect you to get the reast of the answers out of the textbook, which is the worst thing ever. If you don't like reading/interpreting or are unable to read minds, DO NOT take him.
He gives you the answers to the test and quizzes. Easy A

My favorite teacher so far. Sets up his grade scale to make it so anyone who wants an A will get it. Tells lots of fun stories. You'll enjoy attending his class . He truly loves his job and it shows through his teaching. Uses his own website so you don't have to deal with GaView and all its problems. Get registered ASAP, his classes fill quickly.

Interesting guy, has lots of interesting stories. Maps were easy A, mid term and final was easy A. The one big problem I had with the class was that his notes were never what was on his tests. He mentions which pages of the text to read for the test but it is never helpful. Lastly I made an 89.4 in the class and he gave me a B and lost HOPE. NOHELP

Really cool, funny teacher. Lectures for most of the class time but always amuses his students with his past stories. Attendance isn't mandatory but I recommend going cause he pretty much gives you the answers to tests. He makes history interesting and I recommend him for HIST 1110.
Professor Cronin is just awesome. Very nice, grades fairly, and is totally approachable. I highly recommend taking his course for World History.

I loved his class! He was so funny and had me smiling for 3 hours straight! I have NEVER enjoyed history until this class. He makes so many connections to our lives that it doesn't seem like ancient history! I learned SO much and would recommend him to anyone!

Professor Cronin is my favorite professor at KSU. He loves history and tells it like a story - as interesting as can be. He works hard to prepare you for each Quiz and Essay Test. Attendance is not mandatory but if you're in class - he basically hands you the test questions and answers. Take good notes and/or record lecture.

I dreaded going to Cronin's class. Everyday of class he gives a few test questions and answers in between telling irrelevant stories about all the cool things he's done. So ultimately you get all of the answers to every test.. From him. Also, he doesn't use Vista, instead he has his own personal website. Easy A, Yes. Good Professor, NO.

I love this man!! Keeps you laughing, tells you what you need to know for tests. Attendance not mandatory but will make things a lot easier if you go. Class is rarely boring, he's a great story teller. Wish he taught more than just this one class, I'd definitely take him again.

Prof Cronin is AMAZING! I was so lucky to have him my freshmen year. He know his subject and relates to life events. He's hilarious and goes above and beyond to help his students. He gives 5 quizzes lowest gets dropped and basically gives you the answers to the mid-term and final. If you have a chance to be in his class take it you won't regret it.

I HATE HISTORY, but this guy has got it down to a science, almost quite literally. He is funny, interesting, and very smart. He doesn't use Vista, but you don't really need it. All material from textbook. 4 tests, lowest dropped + 2 "map quizzes." I can honestly say that I've learned more about history in this class than any other.

HILARIOUS professor with some very interesting stories to accompany his lecture. If you don't love history, he will make you love it. Almost all of test/quiz questions come from his power points. Actually teaches step-by-step you how to pass his final exam. Ended up being my favorite class of the semester. Take him! You won't regret it.
Best teacher I have had so far.He is a great speaker and his lectures are entertaining.You do have to pay attention to do well but if you go class everyday it should be an easy A.

This guy is great. He talks fast so it's a bit hard to take notes. It's also early in  the morning so even though he's very interesting it's hard to stay fully aware of what he's saying especially if you got a busy schedule. GO to class ALWAYS. He gives extra credit in class. Take good notes and study them! 6 quizzes drop 2, midterm and final

Very cool teacher - provides study reference material, great stories, though has a difficult time staying on track with lecture.  Quizes are consistent with material between lectures and book.  Drops lowest one.  Essay mid-term and final.  Both are easy if you attend class and take notes. Definitely recommend his class!

AWESOME teacher!  He has some great stories and he understands this is a gen ed course and he helps you out A LOT! Go to class, he gives answers to the quizzes, and pretty much tells you exactly what to write for the midterm and final essays.  Final is take home.

is a GREAT teacher. As long as u go to class and listen u will get an A. He tells u what u need to write down 4 tests or exams so u don't have to take tons of notes. he makes his lectures very interesting. Wish he was teaching other history classes so I could take again. doesn't use textbook much, only used for studying for tests if u missed class.
Best teacher you can take for this class. He teaches at weird times, but its worth it to take him. It's extremely easy to get an A as long as you show up. Take him, you wont regret it.
GREAT teacher. Definitely the most interesting lectures I've listened to since I came to KSU.

He is a nice guy; however, the class was kind of boring for me sometimes, especially if you have a busy schedule. He tells you the questions to the first quiz and mid term so you NEED to go to class to get those answers! Read the book. Recommend him

The reason he is so awesome is not just because he is easy like everybody seems to say.  Even if he was one of the hardest teachers, I'd still recommend him because he is interesting as hell.  Him being easy is a plus, but the reason everybody loves him is cause he's an amazing storyteller and really knows what hes talking about.

I seriously miss Cronin.  Wish he taught more courses that I could sign up for.  TAKE HIM IF YOU CAN, REGARDLESS OF TIME.  He is so awesome and interesting.  He went 42 days without food in the Vietnam war..  crazy stories.

He is a great professor, probably the best one i've had. Very easy if u come to class because his test come from notes. He tells great stories. He gives u the answers to his midterm, u just have to write it the way he wants it. He was awesome.

Overall a great class. He is very clear about what is on the quizzes, midterm and final. He literally gives you the answers for the first quiz and then gives you all the page numbers for the rest. He also gives you the midterm the exact way he wants it. You have to attend class for the lectures if you want to pass though.

Never takes attendance, but you need to go to class to take notes. He is very clear about what's on the tests. His website tells you precisely what to read/study for tests. Also, he's a pretty cool guy with interesting stories. Not a difficult class to get an A!
Kinda grueling class, but you need to go to every one. It's worth it for the quizzes and midterm and final. Easy A if you read and go to class.
Professor Cronin is great! You must attend class to get his helpful hints for the tests and quizzes. I only wished that he used georgiaview however he does have his own website.

He is a good professor and he is SUPER easy. He gives a review for every test and gives you the page numbers to read to answer the reviews. He says his midterm and final are "short answer" but in his mind that means bulleted points. Take him if you can, he is a good professor and really easy.

He's a good teacher, but make sure you keep all your graded work. He gave me a zero on my midterm, but the actual grade was a 98. Unfortunately, I could not prove this to him because I lost the midterm, though he was actually at fault. It resulted in me getting a B instead of an easy A.

Cronin can be described in two words, THE MAN. He has some great stories and teaches you a little bit about life along the way. I would take this class again in a heartbeat. pretty easy A as well for minimal work!! Probably the best dressed teacher on a day to day basis at KSU to boot.
He's awesome.  I go to class just to listen to his hilarious stories and comments.  Very smart, teaches you not only history, but life lessons.

I have never learned and come to love so much history as i did in this man's class. He changed my life. Two tests, about 5 quizzes and two map projects. He is not all about the grades and more about teaching you about life. He tells stories and makes you understand. Love him. Could listen tohim for hours. TAKE HIM you wont regret it!
Amazing teacher! Take him, you won't regret it.  You may hate history and he'll make you want to come.  He tells stories all the time. And is very funny.

His method of teaching works!Just go to class, take notes or record them, and do the map assignments. He wants you to make an A so don't miss the class before the midterm and use the system he tells you about on that night!!! Awesome instructor!

The easiest HIST teacher ever! He teaches through stories. He loves HIST. Listen to what he says and follow the instructions for tests and assignments. If you come to class and use the book, you will get an A. Sounds silly to say that, but apparently many students believe college will be easy without participation. He makes class plain and simple!
Be sure to use he study guides for the tests. they are on his website but a little hard to find. He is a good lecturer and wants students to do well.

I didn't buy the textbook and got a B, if I had it an A would've been very easy. Cronin is very passionate about history, his testing methods are a bit unorthodox, but they aren't bad. Bottom line, the guy is great, you should take him.

He's a rockstar of teachers!  Classy and charismatic.  Come to class and see what a teacher should be.  Smart, intelligent, witty and helps you learn a few things you did not before.  His class is absolutely fantastic, and he is extremly helpful.
If you don't make an A in his class, you're an idiot.

Prof. Cronin is great!  Come to class, take notes w/ outline provided, listed to lectures, enjoy the stories and read the assigned study pages.  Lowest quiz grade is dropped.  Prof. Cronin is very helpful and he wants you to succeed.  He gives you tips on how to study for any class you take.
This is a must have as a teacher. Period!!!

Get his outline off his web site.  Put it into to a word doc or print it out and just fill it in? no big surprises on the test ..he  gives you the exact pages to read and gives you sample questions for each quiz? come to class read the pages and do the sample questions and you will get an A.  He will also teach you how to ?study? and take tests. Th

this class is kind of hard. you really need to go to all of the lectures because this is the ONLY place you will get the needed information for midterm and final (NOT IN THE BOOK!!!)  Read the pages he gives you for the test at least TWICE and attend the lectures because you need to connect the ideas in both in order to answer the test questions.

Prof. Cronin set the bar for teaching history at this school. Maybe the head of the department could round up all these part timers and force them to sit in one of his classes for a semester. They may learn how it is done!

Very great professor. Gives study guides and pages to read for the quizzes. Drops the lowest quiz grade. Lectures were interesting but were sometimes hard to follow. My only complaint is that it was straight lecture, so there was no real power point. So if you are a visual learner, you may have some issues. But I came out with an A in the course.

Wonderful teacher! i loved going to his class it was like story time =] he was a lot of fun and would always answer your questions. the first test he gives you the questions and answers and then he gives the pages out of the text that the questions come from. the midterm is memorization-easy stuff and the final is take home-loves his job-take him

Excellent professor for a required lower class. Loves his job, exciting and energetic atmosphere! His main concern is you making a good grade in his class and is willing to take drastic measures to ensure his class succeeds! STRONGLY RECCOMMEND THIS PROF!!

5 quizzes..first quiz he gives you the answers plus he drops your lowest. 2 essays: mid-term and final but they're not narrative essays; you just do an outline. Final exam is take home plus you have 2 maps. his lectures are very funny and interesting. There's no way you can get below a B in this class :)

This professor is GREAT!! Only 5 quizzes and he tells you exactly what pages to read. And 2 exams, tells you exactly whats on them. His Lectures are very interesting you come out knowing alot. Just come to class and take notes (his exams are based on his lectures) & you'll do great. I would definitely take him Again.

Wow! What an Eye Opening experience! Professor Cronin includes modern day faith healing, witchcraft, and levitation to bring the ancient world alive! Comparing the historical persecution of Jews to Jim Jones was inspired. So what if his lectures have nothing to do with his tests! Praise the Lord for George Cronin; History finally taught right!

More a storyteller than instructor. Has specific ways of doing things and is not afraid to share his personal opinions or religious views. Interesting class. Come to class, do work, read textbook... u should make an A.

Best History professor I have ever had, hands down. If you do not make an A or B in this class, you simply didn't show up and follow his instructions. The course is not objectively easy, but he basically holds your hand to show you how to learn and how to take tests well, which helps a lot. Great storyteller, and an awesome man to learn about too!

Great professor! Some people on here have complained of too many "stories"...he brings history to life and makes it interesting. I didn't miss a single class and noticed excellent attendance in class especially since it was a sumr term. There is a lot of material to cover so you actually need to read and study! Wish I could take him for all hist cl
Awesome in so many ways. I want to slap anybody who has left a negative comment about this awesome guy.

One of the best classes I've ever taken! Cronin is so much fun and his stories are amazing. His tests are even fun! A lot of it is memorization and he gives you the answers. He makes class interesting to everyone- not just history majors. You will NOT regret taking this teacher!

I tagged along for a few classes to my friends History class, and I have to tell you I'd die to be in this guys class!  He is an obviously knowledgeable teacher who is a whole lot of fun to watch!  I took one of those tests for fun, ended up acing it from five minutes of studying what he gave the students in class!  You'll learn a lot!

absolutely amazing teacher. can tell he loves history and is extremely helpful. the first 2 quizes he gives you the questions and answers word for word on the test. as well as for the mid term. I highly recommend  taking his class can definetly get an A if you read the book and stick to his method of studying.

Dr. Cronin is awesome.  He's a great story teller but he class is long.  His quizzes are kind of hard but not really because he gives you the questions and answers during the lecture.  His midterm and final are essays but they are easy because he tells you everything that is going to be on there.  I would highly recommend him.

Stay away.  I studied hours for every quiz, and I failed all but two.  The midterm and the final are easy.  Take all the notes you can.  He does give a curve at the end of the semester.  I just didn't enjoy the feeling of studying for nothing all semester.

Cronin is a great professor. His lectures are interesting but long, and he tells funny stories to relate to the lesson. He drops the lowest test grade and often helps you with some of the test answers. He is very helpful and knows the material by heart.  Midterm is a memorize type of test, final is take home. I recommend this class, Cronin is great

Ehh. If u like to learn then, he's not the prof for u. The class is super easy & he's really nice, and his stories are funny but I feel cheated. He gives u the answers & u memorize them & write them down. Its very short-term. Easy A..take it if you don't worry about retaining any info for later use.
History is so boring but he makes it fun b/c he's visited to many countries. His stories are fun! Come to class b/c he tells you which topics will be on the test. You learn a lot from this man!
Prof Cronin is the best, I think every one shoul take him once in there whole academic life.
Professor Cronin was an amazing teacher. I had never enjoyed history until his class. The quizzes can be a bit tricky but if you study and do your work you should get an A.

Awesome guy, really fun. Lecture are a bit boring. But there is a lot he expects you to know for this class, and you need to dig around in the book to study for the quizzes. This is by far the best grade I am getting in any of my 5 classes this semester, honestly you've got to be a****not to get an A in here.

I took his class in summer school.  The first thing he said was, "if we don't get all the way through everything, then we just don't get through it".  He tells all kinds of stories of things he has experienced. Midterm and Final are outlines that you simply memorize and rewrite!!! He gives them to you!!

Great teacher and very easy.  Going to class is a must because he gets very specific on the notes, but he doesn't take attendance.  He gives answers to his quizzes and he tells you EVERYTHING for the midterm and final.  He talks a lot about everything and gets off track all the time.  No assignments except a couple of maps.

Easily one of the easiest History classes I've taken ever. His stories make for a fascinating lecture. He makes it very easy to pass the class by telling you *exactly* what to study. Lectures are for the midterm and final, quizes are from the book pages he lists on the syllabus. Failing this class is a reflection on the student, not the teacher.

This guy is really helpful and is easy. you do need to read the readings he has assigned b/c they come exactly off that page so easy quizzes. he gives out some answers sometimes. midterm and final are even easier than the quizes. final is a take home. you just have to make an outline of the notes so you have to come to class. HIGHLY RECOMMEND HIM

Despite the bs everyone is saying honestly this guy is great, I hardly went to class and never even opened the book I made 50's on all the quizzes and the midterm and final is just an outline of the notes he gives u the answers to the midterm and the final and the final is take home he even gives u a free quiz....the rest is all on you...I made a B

Prof Cronin's lectures/stories are wonderful but they have no bearing on the material that you're tested on.  He was a little disorganized and his quizzes (60% of your grade) were very unclear.  He "gives" you pages #'s to study for the quizzes but the pages don't match the actual questions.  Page #'s from a previous version of the book perhaps?

This is NOT a good instructor.  I learned absolutely nothing in his class!  He was extremely unclear about the subject and gives you the answers for the tests.  I guess this was because he knew that it would be unfair to give you a test when he hadn't taught you anything.  I did really well only because I went to class and took notes before the tes

you can fail pretty much all his quizzes and still get a B in the class. Midterm essay is given word for word and you just have to memorize it and write it down. Final is just write down your notes in "outline" format. Super easy! Just take notes- very easy class.
This teacher makes it so easy.
good teacher.. but he taught nothing of which was on his tests/quizzes. kinda sucked. he was very knowlegable though
One of the best professors I have had yet!
too much of his own experiences. He acts like he was present during all of these historical events. Full of crap and doesn't test on what he teaches which is bogus.

He is so full of himself!  His tests do not reflect his lectures, notes, syllabus, or the reading assignments. All he does is talk about his life and adventures and you're left scratching your head on test day.  DONT TAKE THIS CLASS!

The best history teacher at KSU!! The man is very intelligent and taught me things that I am still using 2 years later. His syllabus is long but that shouldn't deter you from staying in his class. He tells you exactly what you'll be tested on. If you study and do the final (take home) you'll earn an easy A. Nobody should get less than a B!!

He is likable but should he be teaching at a college level? No. Those who liked him seemed to be middle-age women who crawled all over him. He has stong opinions and uses the class as his platform.  Has some knowledge but sounds like its mostly from the discovery channel. To pass, take notes for final/mid and read book for quizzes.

AS A PERSON THIS GUY IS GR8,BUT AS FAR AS A TEACHER NO WAY.HE GOES ON ABOUT THINGS THAT DONT APPLY TO ANYTHING WE WILL BE TESTED ON.HE TALKS BUT I DONT LEARN.HIS TEST COVER NOTHING HE HAS TALKED ABOUT.I KNOW NOTHING MORE ABOUT THIS CLASS THEN WHEN I STARTED,BUT LET ME TAKE A TEST ON HIM I WILL ACEIT

By far the best history teacher I have ever had. I never wanted to miss his class.  Ya, you have to read the material for yourself-- THIS IS COLLEGE!! Read the pages he tells you to, show interest in the class, and take good notes when he tells you to and you will get an A.

You basically have to teach yourself the material for objective tests (65% of the grade).  However, they're multiple choice/fill in the blank and test mostly on the main ideas.  His stories are interesting, but he sometimes goes off on pseudo-political tangents that are basically BS.  Good class.
Really enjoyed his class, shares lots of interesting stories.  Easy as long as you attend and take notes.  Very good class.

Read all the pages in the chapters that he covers.  I don't care if he tells you what page the question comes from, he uses a test bank or an old test.  You can study and take good notes and still not get A's and sometimes B's.  He likes to say it's an easy class, but the the tests questions not cov

He has a 17 page syllabus, 45 pages of notes.  I taped, then transcribed his lectures, memorized it, read the book and when the test was handed out, it was not over what we studied in class.  Talks too much about himself, his views, his life, etc.

What a load of crap!  He is full of himself and has some wierd agenda.  Test are not over notes (the test wont be over the same region or century that you cover in class, no****!!!) It is an easy A though if you play his stupid game. dont waste your time
The best history teacher ever.  I really enjoyed his class and tone of voice!  He is incredibly talented and funny.  I even bought him a friut cake for Christmas.
Fantastic prof. Lots of notes, tests were only hard if you don't study. He was an inspiration to a future teacher.
Very cool teacher. Was a pleasure to have his class.
Great lectures. Confusing quizzes. Midterm is fairly easy, but final is take-home.
